mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r, a.* FROM (select post_num, title, content, writer, reg_date, views, COMMENT_COUNT, notice, url from video where and notice=0 order by post_num desc) a) WHERE r BETWEEN #{postBeginPoint} AND #{postEndPoint}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO(POST_NUM, TITLE, WRITER, REG_DATE, VIEWS, CONTENT, COMMENT_COUNT, NOTICE, url) VALUES(VIDEO_POST_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0, #{content}, 0, #{notice}, #{url})
mapper.select: select count(*) from video where and notice=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO_COMMENT VALUES(#{postNum}, VIDEO_COMMENT_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{id}, SYSDATE, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT A.POST_NUM, A.COMMENT_NUM, A.ID, A.REG_DATE, A.CONTENT, B.ID, B.NICKNAME FROM VIDEO_COMMENT A, MEMBER B WHERE A.ID = B.ID AND A.POST_NUM=#{postNum} ORDER BY COMMENT_NUM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE video SET COMMENT_COUNT= (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIDEO_COMMENT WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum}) WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video_views WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum} AND IP=#{ip}
